video_prompt: A dark-haired anime schoolgirl in uniform draws a katana. Her expression shifts from neutral to determined. Background character panels subtly animate, their faces subtly changing expressions or blinking. Text graphic "c29" flickers.
image_prompt: Anime digital illustration of a dark-haired schoolgirl in a red-trimmed uniform, holding a black katana, in front of muted character panels. Her long black hair, reddish-brown eyes, and sailor collar uniform with a pleated black skirt are prominent. Background features framed anime character faces in muted grey, purple, and pink tones. Stylized "c29" text in red and white in the bottom right corner. Clean, detailed modern anime art style.
refined_video_prompt: The subject draws a katana. Their expression transforms from neutral to determined. Background character panels subtly animate, featuring slight facial expression shifts and blinks. The "c29" text graphic flickers.
